text: The 2024 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix was a Formula One motor race that was happened on December 8, 2024. The race took place at Yas Marina Circuit. in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. This race was the last race of the 2024 Formula One World Championship. Lando Norris won of this race. == References == Category:Formula One Grands Prix Category:Sports events
title: 2024 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix
